question.body: Celiac disease is caused by a problem with which kind of organic compound?

response.feedback: Incorrect. Starch is a carbohydrate and gluten is not in same group as starch.
Correct. Gluten is a protein that stimulates this immune response in some people, so they have to avoid all wheat and related products.
Incorrect. Seeds have lipids in the form of oils, but gluten is not a lipid.
Incorrect. All cells have DNA and RNA, but gluten is not a part of the nucleic acid.

part.hint: Gluten is found in seeds with starch, but it is not in the same organic group as starch.
